overview:
Carol, a former fashion executive, is the founder and CEO of Kravitz Matchmaking, an upscale executive matchmaking service. Carol specializes in pairing up attractive, well-groomed, well-educated, upscale, professional, single people. It’s the place “Where people who wouldn’t be caught dead doing this meet others who wouldn’t consider it if their lives depended on it!”

Carol’s extensive media coverage includes national television segments on Dr. Phil, The Today Show, ABC Nightline News, 60 Minutes II, CNN, Fox and Friends, The CBS Early Show, Fox News, The O’Reilly Factor, The Weekend Today Show and more. She has been featured numerous times in The Wall Street Journal, The New York Times, The New York Times Magazine (COVER STORY), The New Yorker, and New York Magazine. Carol is also an award winning author.

When confidentiality and selection is key, the power elite call on Carol Kravitz. Touting itself as the “boutique” matchmaking service, her business is kept exclusive through the executive sized fees. Her success rate speaks for itself, as Kravitz & Associates is responsible for 900 marriages.
